001.comments: Pre-req: VISA 220. If registration for this class is blocked, then it is full and you should register on the corresponding waitlist. Students will be periodically moved from the waitlist into the class as seats become available, and notified of their registration via email.

01W.comments: VISA 321 01W is a waitlist for VISA 321 001. Pre-req: VISA 220. Students who do not have the appropriate pre-requisite will be de-registered.Students will be moved from the waitlist into the class, space permitting, in order of registration date. While we hope to accommodate all interested students in this class, please be aware that being registered on the waitlist does not guarantee you will obtain a seat.

description: Investigation of drawing as a discipline in the context of contemporary art and theory. Emphasis on self-directed projects in consultation with the instructor.
